title: New: Blood Cultures – Mercury Child
body: Back in October New Jersey’s **Blood Cultures** became one of the most talked about artists in new music with the release of his debut effort, [Indian Summer](www.crackintheroad.com/music/24481-new-blood-cultures-indian-summer/). Gloriously upbeat synth-pop in a similar vein to the likes of Toro y Moi or Neon Indian, _Mercury Child_ almost feels like it’s from another time. Feel good vibes all round.
